data.title: Avago Technologies pays $US6.6bn for LSI
data.meta_description: Avago Technologies, a semiconductor company, will buy the LSI Corporation for about $US6.6 billion in cash, moving into the world of networking and storage chips in a bet on the increased use of cloud and mobile software.
data.text:
Avago Technologies plans to make the biggest acquisition in its history â€” with the help of a former owner.

Avago Technologies, a semiconductor company, said on Monday that it had agreed to buy the LSI Corporation for about $US6.6 billion ($7.4 billion) in cash, moving into the world of networking and storage chips in a bet on the increased use of cloud and mobile software.
